hero.description: Preserving the rich textile heritage of the Algarve region since 1988. Discover over 300 years of Portuguese fashion history.

about.title: Our History
about.description: The Museu do Traje de São Brás de Alportel preserves and displays the rich textile heritage of the Algarve region. Founded in 1988, our museum houses one of Portugal's most comprehensive collections of traditional Portuguese costumes, folk clothing, and ceremonial dress.
about.missionText: To preserve, study, and promote Portuguese textile heritage through innovative exhibitions, educational programs, and cultural initiatives.

exhibitions.title: Exhibitions
exhibitions.permanentDesc: Explore our core collection showcasing traditional Portuguese costumes from various regions and time periods.
exhibitions.temporaryDesc: Discover our rotating exhibitions featuring special themes and guest collections.
exhibitions.previousDesc: Browse through past exhibitions and learn about their unique stories.

tours.title: Book a Tour
tours.subtitle: Experience the museum with a guided tour
tours.description: Our guided tours offer an in-depth exploration of Portuguese textile traditions. Tours are available for groups of 10 or more people.
